take care you and your Cossacks are not all captured!" said the French grenadier. 
The French onlookers and listeners laughed. 
"We'll make you dance as we did under Su- v6rov . . . ," 
said D61okhov. 
"Qu' est-ce qu'H chante?" 
asked a French- man. 
"It's ancient history," said another, guess- ing that it referred to a former war. "The Em- peror will teach your Suvara as he has taught the others ..." 
"Bonaparte ..." began D61okhov, but the Frenchman interrupted him. 
"Not Bonaparte.
